N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7605.4 - Orientation to policies and procedures

State Regulations
(a) All facility staff and civilians and
volunteers who perform services at the facility on a regular basis shall
receive notification and adequate orientation concerning all existing and newly
issued policies and procedures which govern their duties and
responsibilities. (b) All inmates
shall receive notification and adequate orientation concerning all existing and
newly issued policies and procedures which directly affect them as long as such
disclosure is not a threat to the safety or security of the facility. (c) Current copies of all policies and
procedures which the department deems appropriate for inmate access shall be
available in each facility's inmate law library. Notes
